## Requirements
   * Google account
   * `R`
   * `R` pacakges
      - `pacman` - *package manager*
      - `googledrive` - *for reading data files*

## Getting Started

First make sure you have a Google account (or a specific one you would like to use)



Load packages to be used
```{r}
library(pacman) # Loading package manager
p_load(googledrive) # Installing and loading additional packages
```
